title: Allowances: Group Transaction
description: This dataset contains a list of Allowance transactions from member groups

title: Allowances: Member Transaction
description: This dataset contains a list of Allowance transactions from individual members.

title: Bill Timetables
description: This dataset contains Motions lodged by the Parliamentary Bureau proposing the timescales for the passage of a bill through Parliament including Stage 1 (evidence gathering in Committee), Stage 2 (amendments considered in committee), and Stage 3 (amendments in the Chamber and agreement of the final bill)

title: Bills: Bill Stage
description: This dataset contains a list of stages that a bill has been in.

title: Bills: Bill Stage Type
description: This dataset contains a list of Bill Stage Types.

title: Bills: Bill Title
description: This dataset contains a list of Bill Titles

title: Bills: Bill Type
description: This dataset contains a list of applicable types that a bill can be e.g. private, executive etc. The vast majority of bills are Public Bills –which covers Government Bills, Member’s Bills, Committee Bills and others – and it is only a small proportion that are Private Bills.

title: Committees: Current and previous
description: This datatset contains a list of current and previous committees of the Scottish Parliament.

title: Committees: Roles
description: This dataset contains a list of roles a committee can have.

title: Committees: Roles held by MSPs
description: This dataset contains a list of which members held which roles on which committees and when.

title: Committees: Type
description: This dataset contains a list of committee types; these qualify the committee’s objectives and the content that is considered by a committee.

title: Committees: Type connector
description: This dataset contains a list of links used to link a committee to its committee type.

title: Departments: Parliamentary offices
description: This dataset contains a list of current and former departments.

title: Departments: Parties, contractors and Parliamentary offices
description: This dataset contains a list of current and former directorates.

title: Departments: Type
description: This dataset contains a list of directorate types.

title: Elections: Reasons for elections and by-elections
description: This dataset contains a list of reasons someone ceases to be an MSP. This includes dissolution (end of the parliamentary session), resignation, retiral etc.

title: Elections: Status of Member election
description: This dataset contains a list of election statuses.

title: Events
description: This dataset contains a list of Events held in the Scottish Parliament.

title: Legislation: Scottish Statutory Instruments (SSIs)
description: This dataset contains a list of Scottish Statutory Instruments (SSIs). Please note that these can also be known as Secondary Legislation or Subordinate Legislation.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Amendments to Motions
description: This dataset contains the event linking table for Motions, Questions and Answers. Use this to find amendments to motions, which may also include sub-amendments.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Motions
description: This dataset contains all recorded motions taken place within the Parliament.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: MSPs supporting Motions
description: This dataset contains a set of MSPs who have registered support to particular Motions.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (1999)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 1999.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2000)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2000.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2001)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2001.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2002)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2002.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2003)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2003.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2004)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2004.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2005)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2005.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2006)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2006.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2007)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2007.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2008)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2008.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2009)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2009.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2010)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2010.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2011)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2011.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2012)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2012.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2013)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2013.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2014)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2014.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2015)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2015.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Parliamentary Questions Lodged (2016)
description: This dataset contains all the questions lodged in the Parliament during the year of 2016.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Question and Motion subtypes
description: This dataset contains a set of event sub types for Motions, Questions and Answers.

title: Motions, Questions and Answers: Question and Motion types
description: This dataset contains a list of event types, events are a generic term for either a question or a motion.

title: MSPs: Constituencies elected to current and previous
description: This dataset contains the constituency that a member has been elected for, and the status of that election. Each election record will have an associated start and end date, as well as notes required to qualify the status. The member’s election status will be for the party they have membership in for a period greater than their election status.

title: MSPs: Contact address type
description: This dataset contains a list of address types.

title: MSPs: Contact addresses
description: This dataset contains a list of member addresses.

title: MSPs: Cross Party Group Member Roles
description: A collection of all Members and their Roles within a Cross Party Group.

title: MSPs: Cross Party Group Roles
description: A collection of Roles that a Cross Party Group can have.

title: MSPs: Cross Party Groups
description: A collection of Cross Party Groups (CPGs). CPGs provide an opportunity for Members of all parties, outside organisations and members of the public to meet and discuss a shared interest in a particular cause or subject.

title: MSPs: Current and previous
description: This dataset contains a list of current and previous members of the Scottish Parliament, along with additional member information.

title: MSPs: Current and previous Members in the Scottish Government
description: This dataset contains a list of members and government positions.

title: MSPs: Email address categories
description: This dataset contains a list of email address categories.

title: MSPs: Email addresses
description: This dataset contains a list of email addresses.

title: MSPs: Gender
description: This dataset contains a list of Members’ genders.

title: MSPs: List of constituencies current and previous
description: MSPs: List of constituencies current and previous

title: MSPs: List of regions current and previous
description: The dataset contains larger geographical areas each containing seven constituences.

title: MSPs: Ministerial positions in the Scottish Government
description: This dataset contains a list of government positions that ministers can hold.

title: MSPs: Parliamentary web page categories
description: This dataset contains a list of website categories.

title: MSPs: Party membership
description: This dataset contains the member’s political party membership with associated dates

title: MSPs: Regions elected to current and previous
description: This dataset contains the region that a member has been elected for, and the status of that election. This dataset contains the same data as described under the MemberElectionConstituencyStatus dataset.

title: MSPs: Register Of Interests (Beta)
description: This dataset contains information on Registered Interests of Members elected since 5 May 2016. Please note that this dataset is sanitised to remove unnecessary mark-up and as a part of this process, some special characters (such as £) may be removed which may lead to some minor interpretational issues

title: MSPs: Telephone number categories
description: This dataset contains a list of telephone categories.

title: MSPs: Telephone numbers
description: This dataset contains a list of telephone numbers.

title: MSPs: Votes On Motions (Beta) 2011
description: This dataset contains information on how MSPs voted on Motions and Amendments in the Parliament during 2011

title: MSPs: Votes On Motions (Beta) 2012
description: This dataset contains information on how MSPs voted on Motions and Amendments in the Parliament during 2012

title: MSPs: Votes On Motions (Beta) 2013
description: This dataset contains information on how MSPs voted on Motions and Amendments in the Parliament during 2013

description: This dataset contains information on how MSPs voted on Motions and Amendments in the Parliament during 2016

title: MSPs: Votes On Motions (Beta) 2017
description: This dataset contains information on how MSPs voted on Motions and Amendments in the Parliament during 2017

description: This dataset contains information on how MSPs voted on Motions and Amendments in the Parliament during 2018

title: MSPs: Votes On Motions (Beta) 2022
description: This dataset contains information on how MSPs voted on Motions and Amendments in the Parliament during 2022

title: MSPs: Website addresses
description: This dataset contains a list of member websites.

title: Official Report Committee Meeting Contributions (Beta) 1999
description: This dataset contains information and text from the Official Report, which is the substantially verbatim report of all public parliamentary proceedings taken during 1999

title: Parties: Current and previous
description: This dataset contains a list of Parties.

title: Parties: Current and previous roles held by Members
description: This dataset contains all the party roles for each party.

title: Parties: Roles available in parties
description: This dataset contains the role a member can have in their current political party.

title: Petitions: Categories
description: This dataset contains a list of subject categories assigned to petitions.

title: Petitions: Countries signees come from
description: This dataset contains a list of countries of residence of  petition signees.

title: Petitions: Current and previous
description: This dataset contains a  list of submitted petitions.

title: Petitions: Discussions
description: This dataset contains a list of petition discussions.

title: Petitions: Petitioners
description: This dataset contains a list of petition signatories.

title: Petitions: Petitions submitted on behalf of organisations
description: This dataset contains a list of petition onbehalfofs.

title: Petitions: Statuses
description: This dataset contains a list of statuses for all petitions.

title: Planned Chamber Business
description: This dataset contains Motions lodged by the Parliamentary Bureau that sets out all proposed Chamber business a week in advance of the business taking place, and all motions to revise planned Chamber business at shorter notice.

title: Research: External
description: This datatset contains a list of external researches that have been commissioned for the Scottish Parliament.

title: Sessions: Dates of Parliamentary sessions
description: This dataset contains a list of parliamentary sessions and their dates.
